entries.title: Twitter API no longer free as platform will begin charging, angering developers
entries.description: Users criticize the move with some stating it will destroy important research and activism on Twitter.

entries.title: No power needed: groundbreaking color e-paper display looks like pure magic but isn’t
entries.description: Permanent color poster-size electronic display is a reality, but it comes at steep price.

entries.title: These fake iOS apps just want to trick you out of your crypto
entries.description: Researchers are warning of scammers stealing cryptocurrency by posing as attractive, rich women.

entries.title: AMD Ryzen 7000X3D processors to launch later this month with 3D V-cache tech
entries.description: Sporting performance-enhancing tech like 3D V-cache, AMD's next-gen CPUs continue the PC gaming war with Intel.

entries.title: ChatGPT already feared to be behind multiple cyberattacks
entries.description: Nation-states are already all over the tech, experts fear, but the worst is yet to come.

entries.title: Heard of the Ninja Speedi?
entries.description: The Ninja Speedi is going to make meal times quicker, easier and healthier - I just know it.

entries.title: Malicious use of Microsoft OneNote documents on the rise
entries.description: The number of campaigns increased eight-fold in just a month, researchers are saying.

entries.title: This new Overwatch 2 map may be awful for Mei but it’s great for us
entries.description: Blizzard has announced the new map that will accompany Overwatch 2 Season 3, and it looks like we’re going to the frozen tundra.

entries.title: Earfun's new earbuds bring cutting-edge features for a third the price of AirPods Pro
entries.description: Budget brand goes cutting-edge with new earbuds that are the first to feature advanced LE Audio tech for such a cheap price – and that's not all.

entries.title: Elgato Stream Decks are now compatible with Microsoft Teams
entries.description: Elgato’s switchboards for PCs aren’t cheap, but you can get a good deal right now.

entries.title: PS5 update means the console is catching up with Xbox Series X framerates
entries.description: Sony has rolled out beta firmware that enables VRR in 1440p even for unsupported games for a faster experience.

entries.title: 2022 was the biggest year ever for crypto hacking
entries.description: Billions in crypto were stolen in 2022, mostly from DeFi bridges.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 pre-order deal gets you a $100 credit at Amazon - here's how
entries.description: Amazon's Samsung Galaxy S23 pre-order deal gets you a $100 credit on the S23 Series, plus a free storage upgrade.

entries.title: Hackers use new IceBreaker malware to breach gaming companies
entries.description: Devious backdoor could be hiding in the screenshot your customer sends looking for 'help'.

entries.title: Meta is making some big changes to its data center plans
entries.description: Facebook’s parent company seems to be weathering the storm reasonably well, with plans for new data centers.

entries.title: Most companies claim they aren't seeing any benefits from using cloud
entries.description: PwC study aims to show businesses where they’re going wrong and how they can get the most out of cloud.

entries.title: Microsoft – stop it already with the shady tricks to push Windows 11 upgrades
entries.description: Remember the furor over Windows 10 upgrade tactics? Microsoft doesn’t seem to have learned its lesson.

entries.title: ChatGPT Plus costs the same as Adobe Photoshop – and that’s still too much
entries.description: ChatGPT's new paid tier promises better performance, but its $20 a month price tag could be too much for most people.

entries.title: Windows 11 preview has a hidden feature that makes life on the desktop easier
entries.description: Microsoft has made some changes to Windows 11 which are music to our ears (literally).

entries.title: LockBit is back, with a new ransomware source code
entries.description: Dreaded LockBitransomware is now using Conti's code, researchers claim.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 defaults to Adobe Lightroom - whether you want it or not
entries.description: Adobe Lightroom to be default photo editor on the Samsung Galaxy S23 series.

entries.title: Super Bowl LVII will screen in 4K and Dolby Vision, but there's a catch
entries.description: Dolby Vision HDR has come to TV sports, but limited distribution means experiencing it won't be easy.

entries.title: Netflix brings its impressive Spatial Audio sound to even more shows
entries.description: Netflix has expanded Spatial Audio support to 700 titles across its platform.

entries.title: Best Super Bowl VPN deals for 2023: Watch the big game no matter where you are
entries.description: Need to get around geo-restrictions to watch the big game? Here are all the best VPN deals for the Super Bowl in 2023.

entries.title: Even Netflix doesn’t know what its password-sharing rules should be
entries.description: Netflix has changed its password-sharing rules twice in the span of a week, suggesting it could be introducing new restrictions soon.

entries.title: Your least favorite search engine is getting a ChatGPT boost
entries.description: Microsoft Bing is using OpenAI’s ChatGPT to take on Google, but will it be enough?

entries.title: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 could have a truly enormous screen
entries.description: A report suggests an Apple Watch Ultra successor is in the works, with a massive screen and better display tech.

entries.title: Dying Light 2 update "focusing on combat" to make every night terrifying
entries.description: Techland is ratcheting up the horror, announcing major changes to Dying Light 2’s deadly, zombie-filled nights.

entries.title: HBO Max, Paramount Plus join Netflix in frustrating 2023 TV show cancellation spree
entries.description: Netflix isn't the only studio that's purging its streaming services of fan-favorite content.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams Premium is officially here for everyone
entries.description: AI is here to make virtual and hybrid meetings more convenient - at the expense of regular Microsoft Teams licenses.

entries.title: Apple Watch owners' next must-have gadget is a sleep-tracking smart Oura Ring
entries.description: You can now view your sleep stats and more on the Oura Ring watchOS app for Apple Watch, or your iPhone's lock screen.
